cause.description:
To raise awareness for the cancers that have little, to no chance the further they are left alone. It can be stopped if there is knowledge about it. Cancer does not have to end in death.
1. Cancer may kill some but we can still encourage
2. lets raise money to go towards research of those cancers that don't have cures yet
3. cancer that affects children should not go unnoticed
cause.mission: raise awareness of the most fatal cancers
cause.name: Cancer Stinks
